metadata.description: A new series guaranteed to please readers of all ages who love the app! Follow the adventures of Red, Chuck, Bomb, Matilda, the Bad Piggies, Terence, and Stella. Jam-packed with silly misunderstandings, bungled plans, and high-flying fun, this collection of stories will have both longtime readers and new fans laughing until they fall down harder than a wooden tower filled with green pigs.
metadata.name: Angry Birds Comics Quarterly
